description: Manage trusted root certificates of an application gateway.

commands.name: az network application-gateway root-cert create
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway root-cert create --gateway-name
                                                --name
                                                --resource-group
                                                [--cert-file]
                                                [--keyvault-secret]
                                                [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network application-gateway root-cert create --cert-file FilePath --gateway-name MyGateway --name MyTrustedRootCertificate --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az network application-gateway root-cert delete
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway root-cert delete --gateway-name
                                                --name
                                                --resource-group
                                                [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network application-gateway root-cert delete -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway -n MyRootCert

commands.name: az network application-gateway root-cert list
examples: az network application-gateway root-cert list -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway

commands.name: az network application-gateway root-cert show
commands.summary: Get the details of a trusted root certificate.
examples: az network application-gateway root-cert show -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway -n MyRootCert

commands.name: az network application-gateway root-cert update
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway root-cert update --gateway-name
                                                --name
                                                --resource-group
                                                [--add]
                                                [--cert-file]
                                                [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                [--keyvault-secret]
                                                [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                [--remove]
                                                [--set]
examples: az network application-gateway root-cert update --cert-file FilePath --gateway-name MyGateway --name MyTrustedRootCertificate --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az network application-gateway root-cert wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
